overview: It tells the thrilling story of Bai Xia, a master of the Central Plains, went to Fusang, and worked hand in hand with the great onmyoji Abe Haruaki to find the list of consecrated gods, and cast down demons and eliminate demons. The list of the gods is hidden in the Fusang court, and the demons and evil spirits are also waiting for the opportunity. Scenes of hilarious and thrilling stories unfold.
title: League of Gods: Soul Master
